body_html: This builds on the _scalar_sum function which will go away when we have full 0-dim tensor support; if there's an objection to having this temporarily I can wait to commit, but I wanted to have a fairly standalone PR for this.
body_text: This builds on the _scalar_sum function which will go away when we have full 0-dim tensor support; if there's an objection to having this temporarily I can wait to commit, but I wanted to have a fairly standalone PR for this.
body: This builds on the _scalar_sum function which will go away when we have full 0-dim tensor support; if there's an objection to having this temporarily I can wait to commit, but I wanted to have a fairly standalone PR for this.
